text: That Luzmela Girl (Spanish:La niña de Luzmela) is a novel by the Spanish writer Concha Espina, which was first published in 1909. In 1949 it was adapted into a film That Luzmela Girl directed by Ricardo Gascón.de España p.109 ==References== ==Bibliography== * de España, Rafael. Directory of Spanish and Portuguese film-makers and films. Greenwood Press, 1994. Category:1909 novels Category:Spanish novels Category:Novels set in Spain Category:Spanish novels adapted into films
title: That Luzmela Girl (novel)
